item.title: Create dummy directories using Rsync
item.description: Use rsync to create dummy dirs: rsync -avPih --include '*/' --exclude '*' videos/ ~/Desktop/videos-dummy/ Hereâ€™s a breakdown of the command: -avPih: These flags stand for: -a: Archive mode, which preserves permissions, timestamps, symbolic links, etc. -v: Verbose, which provides detailed output. -P: Combines –progress and –partial, showing progress during transfer and allowing for partial transfers to be resumed. -i: Output a change-summary for all updates. -h: Output numbers in a human-readable format.
